alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Eastern Fall River; Hermosa Foothills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foothills; Northern Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foothills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Oglala Lakota; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills; Western Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 2:28AM MST until January 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota and northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: The combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.
